name: Jose Luis Arevalo
text: Food looked amazing and was delicious. They have great options all around. The cheesy bread in my opinion is the best in GA! The hoagies are also a great option if you are looking for a lighter yet yummy option. And the pizza is always good especially when dining in and served hot 🔥

name: Chris M.
text: Placed order over the phone 10/29/20 around 8:30 on the way home from football practice.  Our pizza was ready before the estimated time and the staff who came to our car for curbside pickup was friendly and very helpful.  Great experience.  My kids enjoyed the pizza, as always.

name: Lori Feeley
text: This was the 1st time eating there, all I can yes delicious 😋, great service, friendly staff, my waiter was amazing

name: chris johnson
text: Eating at the store is always great, but their carry out is a joke.  They never even come close to the time they provide, so you always sit there and wait for 30 minutes. They also seem to know you won’t see your food until you’re home, or …More

name: Cheri Bradley
text: I am generally not a fan of pizza but Mellow Mushroom is OUT OF THIS WORLD! I love Mellow Mushroom's pizza weirdness. The flavors are so fresh and the delicious thin crust and the Lil' Greek salad. AND THE ESPERANZA salad dressing, I love …More

name: Jordi English
text: My server Lauren was absolutely fantastic, she made sure i was well taken care of and made me feel super welcome. If I'm ever in the area again I'll definitely be back! Thanks so much for all your hard work!

name: Charles Shields
text: The food was absolutely fantastic. Try the garlic and olive oil base in place of the red sauce on the pizza. It is delicious. The roasted potatoes that come with the sandwiches are really tasty.

name: christy criswell
text: I come here for their wonderful pizza.  It's sooo crunchy and delicious.  Have been coming here for years.  The whole pizza tastes great and most of their specialties are awesome.

name: Nirav Patel
text: Good food, decent prices ! I got a net mellow mushroom has always been a staple favorite for me. Absolutely loved us hippie vibe! Service was great and prompt we were seated promptly and the order was taking quickly. All in all a great experience!

name: Charlotte Rogers
text: We compared you to Athens location.A little less sauce and this would be perfect. Such good service. Thank you So much

name: scott shabdue
text: I've ordered a few times since moving back to the area.  They've been constantly good. Ready when scheduled.  I love the ability to choose between thin and a thicker crust. …More

name: Stanley Yelnats
text: Pacific Rim is AWSOME!!! One of the best pies I've had in a long time

name: NotScholar
text: Some of the best pizza around here. Never to burnt. Always perfection.

name: Elena Iogha
text: Always awesome!! Great food, great drinks, and amazing staff!

name: William Allen
text: Foods awesome but don’t expect anything quickly, if you’re not seated at the bar you’d better plan to be there around 2-2 and a half hours.

name: Paul_Junior617
text: Hey it's mellow mushroom. It's always good!

name: King Rousey
text: This was one of the best pizza I had this year.   Yall get a 10 star from me #ATL #KingRousey

name: Dennis Crawford
text: great pizza and they'll bring it out to your car!

name: Nate Russell
text: Great pizza! Courteous staff! Can't go wrong! #delicious

name: Ice Archer
text: I've been twice recently and gotten The Sausagefest calzone and both time it was very good, very large and fairly priced. Service was fine and waiting for food didn't take very long

name: Ted Objartel
text: Usually it is great.  This time the pizza was not cooked as long as usual.   been going here for years and I will go back though

name: keith brown
text: Good food and fast service - (had take out)

name: John Winstanley
text: I love the mellow mushroom concept I try to go to any location that I can when I travel. This location is very clean very large but yet has a laid-back vibe to it that all mellow mushrooms share. Staff was very attentive.

name: Au Natural
text: Love Mellow Mushroom as a whole but this place gets 0 stars from me. It was so cold in this place we were shivering. We looked around and even saw other people with arms folded shaking to stay warm what the heck. There was nowhere to move …More

name: jared jacobson
text: Food is awesome. Ordered 2 meatball hoagies togo. They were in great Togo containers . Not shoved in to a styrofoam container.  They heated up perfectly.

name: Bob Johnson
text: I love MM! This pizza is so good. Salads are huge and fresh. They have a good beer selection.  If you need a casual night out, this is a great destination.  Indoor and outdoor seating - super-friendly service.

name: Joey Tripp
text: I recommend the Holy Shiitake pie with chicken added. Yummy!

name: Keisha D
text: Covid safe, friendly staff and most important great pizza!

name: Remaining Anonymous
text: Great environment, but ive had better pizza.

name: Angela Malcom
text: I love mellow mushroom, but what’s up with their new logos on the pizza boxes and bags? Seriously?!?!?

name: Chris Hackett
text: Great pizza.  Great beer.  Great service. Can't go wrong. The only place where the crust is a good as the pizza!

name: Hunter Meininger
text: Classic 'Za, and specialty 'za. It don't matter, you will be satisfied beyond belief. Anyone wanna go?

name: Nancy K
text: Consistently great pizza! Family-friendly, something for everyone on their menu. Large beer and wine menu. Try the Kosmic Karma specialty pizza. It’s great hot or cold the next day :) MM is in great location for shopping and/or browsing in Barnes and Noble after the meal. Large Starbucks cafe in BN, comfy chairs, lots of table seating.

name: Paul Cygielman
text: Great service and presentation of menu items.   Great selection of gourmet pizzas and other lunch and dinner items. Restaurant was very clean and crowded with families.

name: Smaran Dixit
text: Some of the best food I have ever had it's great got other fun things games on tv 5 stars but I'm  only giving 4 because of the long wait but it's good don't come so you don't make my wait longer

name: Gabe Fitzhugh
text: Very friendly staff, good food. We had pizza and salads. One of my favorite places to eat.

name: stephenie dasinger
text: 15 minute wait on a Saturday night isn't bad. Food was great! Our server, Victoria, was the best!!

name: Tiffany York-Vargas
text: Love the manager and staff here. Came by after having gone to a funeral because we knew we should eat something and it was the only thing that sounded good. And everyone was super sweet and just awesome.

name: Caitlin Lewis
text: We waited over an hour for the waitress to tell me she forgot to put in our order. We waited 15 more minutes but with a toddler we had to finally request to cancel the order. I still waited another 15 minutes for the check to pay for our …More

name: Stacy Assaf
text: Mellow Mushroom Restaurants vary a good bit from location to location. For example, the one on Peachtree Parkway near State Bridge Road in Johns Creek, Georgia usually has slow, bad service but the one in Oxford, Alabama is amazing. This …More

name: Tracy Whitehead
text: We love mellow mushroom!!! Great service an great food! Wish you would come 2 dawsonville

name: Victoria Voorhees-Condrey
text: Extremely rude staff! We were totally Ignored! The staff, all of them, never greeted us or offered to seat us. All staff on duty literally looked over our head at the couple who came in and stood behind us. The staff all stopped what they …More

name: Vijay Alagarraj
text: Love their pizza crust; kosmic karma is our favorite.

name: Victor Gerhardt
text: Excellent Service! Great Food!

name: Ner Nerpz
text: Great food and service. Everyone there was really friendly. Ask for Garret he did a great job!

name: Lisa Ponnwitz
text: We love Mellow mushroom! Always happy staff and great food.

name: Nicole Hardy
text: It's our pleasure!!  All 3 of us in my house LOVE Mellow Mushroom!!!

name: Phil R
text: Great service and food!

name: Jonathan Orellana
text: Food was amazing! It did take a bit to come out but the service was fantastic! I will be coming back again soon.

name: francesca higham
text: The service was amazing and the pizza was to die for

name: James Welsh
text: Great pizza, but cost more than all others.

name: Monika Arora
text: Food is always great. Servers are always friendly. I love how they always have different events happening like balloon artists or trivia night. I had an AC vent dripping on me and still had s good time

name: D s
text: Very personable and on top of customer service.

name: Paola Hz

name: Benjamin Jordan
text: The best pizza you or your momma or any of your extended family will ever eat. So good.

name: Luciano Menk
text: Good variety of pizzas, good service with decent price.

name: Mike Hopkins

name: Stephen Norris

name: Ken Runyan
text: It was a convenient location and they had pizza.

name: Dee Ann Presnell
text: This has to be the hardest pizza to cut. I had the server bring me a steak knife. There was still a struggle. What are the ingredients in this pizza? Our server was wonderful!

name: April Carlisle
text: We go to trivia every Tuesday.  The food is always delicious and Victoria is THE BEST EVER!!!

name: Burton Wilson Jr
text: New menu, food came out timely, nice beer selection

name: CJ Carlisle
text: Awesome atmosphere. Great service. Very tasty pizza!

name: AidenplayzXbox
text: PAPER STRAWS!!!! PAPER STRAWSSSS I HATE PAPER STRAWS!!!! the food is also bad

name: Robert Roy Danner, Jr.
text: We always love the Mushroom! Place is always enjoyable with some pretty good service. Pizza always tastes amazing. Love some of the local beer flavors they have. We had a large party of 16 and it went as smoothly as it did the night before …More

name: Sara Sousa
text: Tonight, I placed my first online order with mellow mushroom, for delivery using doordash. I received the order in a timely manner, except one of the main items was missing. I called this location and spoke to the manager, Marin. Super nice …More

name: Derek Luster
text: Great food and beer selection. Service was quick. The place was trendy but good for all ages. The wings were cooked perfectly and I highly recommend those.

name: Jessica Stamets
text: Great appetizers and awesome pizza. Great service and atmosphere. Bruschetta and pretzel bites are so good. We eat here often and have never had a bad experience.

name: Janak Joshi
text: Pizza was good enough but the anthropomorphic mushroom dude outside kept checking me out and wolf whistling. I’m pretty sure he lured one of the children from another table into the depths of his steel bowels, never to be seen again. Good pizza but don’t sit outside, he’s kinda creepy.

name: david sbraham
text: Very clean store staff is wonderful, hope the new ovens keep you guys baking

name: Donald Hughes
text: Great Service but I have had better pizza from the frozen food aisle. Ordered a Sausage and Spinach pizza. Sausage was just not good at all, the sauce was just bland. Probably a great place for drinks and wings, but needs to think twice about pizza.

name: Taylor Seabolt
text: I love this location. I have never had any issues. It is very decorative and fun inside. It definitely has an upscale pizzeria feel. It is a little pricey for those of you that expect Papa John's cost, but it is so worth it. I have two …More

name: Vijaya Saradhi P
text: Liked the restaurant, small cozy one. High back sofas give u ample privacy. Food tastes great. Service is slow but understandable due to busy times

name: Swaroop Rao
text: For the appetizer, we had the pretzel bites and they were delicious. Portion size was also sufficient for a family of 4 adults. Next, we ordered two medium sized pizzas and they were both delicious. Service was a bit slow but the boy/person …More

name: Maya Berri
text: I just don’t understand what the fuss is about with Mellow Mushroom. There are other places with better pizza. We went on a Friday early evening (around 6 pm). We ordered two small salads (one Greek and one Caesar) and a medium pizza with …More

name: david fox
text: People who like Mellow Mushroom don't know PIZZA. THE SAUCE, in my opinion, taste like frozen pizza, which I don't eat. CRUST PIZZA in Alpharetta and VINTAGE PIZZA in Milton are THE BEST.  SORRY.

name: Dawn Frazzano
text: Best pizza in town🙂

name: ruby guerrero713
text: First time here, very delicious.

name: Darrell Sheffield
text: Consistently good pizza, the Mellow Mushroom way. This location has never let us down.

name: Ninja Squad
text: You can never go wrong with those place. My absolute favorite is the holy shiitake mushroom pizza but I also really enjoy the tofu sub which they can make vegan. Yum!  If you are looking for a spot with vegan and gluten free items, this is it.

name: Staci Fyfe
text: Good food,  good service

name: Jeff Grundman
text: Great pizza. Great beer selection. Very reasonable prices. The cool hippy vibe is just an added bonus.

name: Ms. Sassy
text: Rude and unprofessional staff. Would not eat there or recommended.

name: Alfred Morris Jr.
text: Excellent food and drinks. Great atmosphere and service. Beautiful patio. I stop in every time I'm in the area.

name: shilpa koti
text: Tasty food but a little crowded on weekends. Good service though.

name: Roopchand Kujuluva
text: Very busy,  but great place to hang out.

name: Kyle S
text: Yum! Mellow Mushroom always has dang good pizza, salads, etc. Staff is friendly and the vibes are "groovy." Recommend.

name: Tom Morgan
text: Service was good. Food quality was very good. Price is a little bit high for quality and service though.  And there are no complaints with this.  You just have to be aware that the pizza is a but expensive compared to others, but it is much …More

name: Ruban Balasubramaniam
text: Friendly and casual place for dine in and nice food for reasonable price.

name: Joyce Sieben
text: Good

name: Nugget Cast
text: Third time I’ve tried to place an order for pickup on a weekday with an hour or more before closing, and they don’t answer the phone. You close at 10 and stop answering the phone at 8:30?? Whoever works at night should be fired.

name: Coach Damarus Moton
text: Good service, Good food.

name: Raymundo Hernandez
text: Service could've been better. Overall good experience, good food, when the staff was there they were friendly and attentive. Jst seems they were overwhelmed, not necessarily their fault tho

name: N S
text: Absolutely the best pizza in town. Service was impeccable and everyone is so nice and accommodating.

name: Sophia Lo
text: Food was good but service sucked.

name: Will Willets
text: It was extremely busy and we still had fast and consistent service. The pizza was amazing. I even enjoyed the spinach dip, not usually a fan of spinach dip, but this was delicious.

name: Bonnie Esrig
text: After a 500 mile drive in snowy weather, we arrived in Cumming tired and stressed.  After checking into our nearby hotel, we visited Mellow Mushroom.  What a great experience!  The staff was super welcoming and friendly.  The food was …More

name: Josh Warren
text: Good pizza with a great crust the lunch specials are good as well as the appetizers. I like the buufalo chicken speciality pizza. It has a ton of flavor.

name: jeanne randall
text: Had lunch with my daughter. The calzone we order was excellent!!! The waitress was great!!!

name: ALexzia Thomas
text: I have to say that the manager named Mike was quick to address an issue from earlier today. I must say he needs to be promoted for taking care of business swiftly and  with sincerity. Thank you Mike🙂

name: Oscar Medina
text: Best spinach and artichoke dip I have ever had

name: Christopher Chambers
text: Although a chain, still one of the best places to sit and grab a pizza and a beer. The atmosphere is welcoming and the staff, from every visit I've been, have been attentive and friendly.

name: Matthew Smith
text: I didn't discover this chain till about a year ago, but it's hands down my favorite pizza I've had. The staff is great, the wait times are acceptable, and the overall atmosphere makes for a very enjoyable experience. Literally the only gripe I have is that I don't have one close enough to me.

name: Brandon Elliott
text: Great service and went beyond to make sure there was no contamination in our food due to a food allergy.

name: Stacey Chadwell
text: Great kosmic karma.  Good atmosphere. Good food.

name: Kimberly Biggs
text: I love this fresh warm bread that wraps a bed of smoked turkey (I leave off the ham), crunchy bacon, grilled onions, fresh mushrooms and melted cheese topped with fresh sprouts!!! Options for half or whole sandwich.

name: Michael Belk
text: Ellen is the best bartender I've ever had. Definitely go there and ask for her.

name: Justin Wilson
text: The pizza, by the slice, has been hit or miss. During my last visit the pizza slice that I ordered was overcooked. Salads are always great, but I have had mixed experiences during lunch.  I enjoy the atmosphere and normally the food is …More

name: William Floyd
text: I think pizza is like bar-b-que. Its really subjective to what you like. Everyone is different on crust and sauces they like. This location is always very consistent on quality and service. I usually get it to go but have eaten on location …More

name: Melvaney Dinsmore
text: Wonderful great food and service

name: Brooke Kunzman
text: Great food and great staff

name: Meghan Moore
text: Great pizza, great service. A little pricey. You get what you pay for applies in this case I think. Worth it

name: norm hall
text: My wife has celiac disease the server in the kitchen took it very seriously manager even involved they were great and the food was great she didn't get sick no cross-contamination

name: Frank Powell
text: Some of the best pizza in town, hands down. Eat there whenever I can. Only complaints is the price and the staff.

name: Jennifer Kielhorn

name: Jay Thomas

Great pizza! Just be prepared to wait.

text: All around good vibes from this pizza place.  Tried out the pretzel bites with beer cheese and was not disappointed.  Wait staff was relaxed, food was excellent.  Only negative thing is the seating was very close together...too many …More

name: Catrice Pippens
text: Vegan cheese pizza options!

name: VitusJBering
text: Me and my family go to trivia every week at this location. Arguably the best location for Trivia in Cumming! The food is wonderful as it always has been at this Mellow Mushroom. Friendly upbeat atmosphere and the tables, seats, and bathrooms are always clean. If you're hungry and want somewhere reliable, this is your best bet.

name: Steve Crawford
text: Terrible Service.  It took 35 minutes just to get our drinks (after we finally complained).    Now, we've been waiting for our food for an hour and a half.  Everyone seated near us came in after we did and most have finished eating by now.  Still, we wait.  Clearly this place is poorly managed.  Don't come here.  We won't be back.

name: Mr E
text: Over priced lame combos. Miss the old spot

name: Johnny Rockett

text: Friendly staff, nice beer selection, great lunch specials!

name: mitch wyatt
text: Awesome and unique ambiance.

name: Linda Adamo
text: I had the Italian sub. This was honestly the worse sub I ever had. Very disappointed. Love the MM in Gainesville, Don't recommend this one.

name: A P

name: Barry Boyles

name: Drew Holdiman
text: sometimes it's great... sometimes it's good... & sometimes very disappointing. would like to see more consistency with the food

name: Justin McDaniel
text: The owners of the specific franchise (Charles and Kelly Wilson) are very friendly people. Everyone on staff is super friendly and I have nothing but the best to say about them. I've never had a problem with the food or the servers ever

text: My wife and I were visiting from Canada in Cumming for a family wedding & we were looking for a good Italian restaurant. Mushroom Mellow exceeded our expectations from the greeting by the staff at the front to our very professional and …More

name: Stephen Croft
text: Food is great, lots of eclectic choices. Good drink selections. Service can get slow at times, don't go here if you're in a hurry.

name: AS Rau
text: Love coming to this location.  The staff is always friendly and helpful and the food is awesome, have tried several different pizza toppings, appetizers and beers and they have always been great.  It can get busy which is a pain if it's …More

text: This was our first time going, and it was awesome! The beer selection is killer, and the pizza was phenomenal. Would definitely recommend!

name: Tom Chitty

name: Randy Canada

text: Good food, good service. We ate outside and there was a good amount of space, although it was hot outside (not their fault; alternative was wait 30 minutes for inside seating). Parking is crazy here on a Friday evening! Always liked their crust, here, so it was a good dinner.

name: tony elliott
text: We want to thank Robert our Waiter for such good service and his recommendations. He made us feel more like a guest at his house. Thanks again!

text: Great pizza! Would love to see one in Pennsylvania.

name: matt matt

name: Crash RipRock
text: It’s okay , but really just one step above the national pizza chains.  Difference here is the eclectic toppings, but they’re all bread heavy.  I think Rosati’s across the street is slightly better.  If you’re after good pizza, you’re better …More

name: James Neuhaus, jr
text: Pretty good, prices are higher than domino's and papa johns, but you get what you pay for.  Pizza is delicious and salad was on point.  Staff was a little bothered but overall we enjoyed it.

name: Minette H
text: One of the best pizza restaurants in Cumming Georgia.

name: Jared Blank
text: Great first experience at Mellow Mushroom. The HOLY SHIITAKE pie was unbelievable and one of the best pizzas I've ever had. Great place for families as well. We will be returning!

name: Brie Wright

name: Nancy M-R
text: Great parking, safe area, clean big beautiful restaurant with great menu and friendly servers.

name: Janet Curry
text: Great pizza!

name: Jeff Baker
text: Ordered take out and it must have been an off night. Order took over an hour in spite of being told  the wait was 20 minutes. Staff were really working hard however and they were very apologetic. Pizza was great once it came. If your ordering take out or eating in you should expect to wait.

name: Kevin Woodall
text: Good food takes time to bake, don't go expecting a quick lunch but the wait is worth it

name: Jeff Hancock
text: Always great!

name: Conor C

text: Good customer service, friendly family oriented environment and good selection of draft beers make this p km ace a must go especially on weekends.

name: Caroline Reilly Music
text: My friend and I decided to go eat here for lunch. The food was good but our waiter was not the nicest. I believe his name was Alex, he rolled his eyes at my friend while she was getting her money out to pay. The food was good but the waiter was very rude.
